verses.verse: Better <S%H2896><s%> is the <S%H7326>poor<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%> Than he that is <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips<s%> and is a <S%H3684>fool<s%>.
Also <S%H5315><s%>, that the soul be without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>; And he that <S%H213>hasteth<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>.
The <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5557>subverteth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>; And his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2196>fretteth<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> <S%H3254>addeth<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%>; But the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is <S%H6504>separated<s%> from his <S%H7453>friend<s%>.
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>; And he that <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall not <S%H4422>escape<s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> will <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of the <S%H5081>liberal<s%> <S%H7453>man<s%>; And every man is a friend to <S%H376>him<s%> that giveth <S%H4976>gifts<s%>.

All the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor<s%> do <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4828>him<s%>: How much more do his friends go <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H7291>him<s%>! He pursueth them with <S%H561>words<s%>, but they are gone.
He that <S%H7069>getteth<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>: He that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>; And he that <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.
Delicate <S%H8588><s%> living is not <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool<s%>; Much less for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to have <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H8269>princes<s%>.
The <S%H7922>discretion<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> maketh him <S%H748>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>; And it is his <S%H8597>glory<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2197>wrath<s%> is as the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion<s%>; But his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is as <S%H2919>dew<s%> upon the <S%H6212>grass<s%>.

A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H1942>calamity<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>; And the <S%H4079>contentions<s%> of a <S%H802>wife<s%> are a <S%H2956>continual<s%> <S%H1812>dropping<s%>.
House <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H1952>riches<s%> are an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> from <S%H1>fathers<s%>; But a <S%H7919>prudent<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> is from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Slothfulness <S%H6103><s%> <S%H5307>casteth<s%> into a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%>; And the <S%H7423>idle<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall suffer <S%H7456>hunger<s%>.
He that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>; But he that is <S%H959>careless<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
He that hath <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3867>lendeth<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And his good <S%H1576>deed<s%> will he pay him <S%H7999>again<s%>.
Chasten <S%H3256><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, seeing there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>; And set not <S%H5315>thy<s%> <S%H5375>heart<s%> on his <S%H4191>destruction<s%>.
A <S%H1419>man<s%> of <S%H1632>great<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H6066>penalty<s%>; For if thou <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3254>him<s%>, thou must do it yet again.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, and <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, That thou mayest be <S%H2449>wise<s%> in thy latter <S%H319>end<s%>.
There are <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> in a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%>; But the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>.
That which maketh a <S%H120>man<s%> to be <S%H8378>desired<s%> is his <S%H2617>kindness<s%>; And a poor <S%H7326>man<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H376>than<s%> a <S%H3577>liar<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> tendeth to <S%H2416>life<s%>; And he that hath it shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied<s%>; He shall not be <S%H6485>visited<s%> with <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>burieth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish<s%>, And will not so much as <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

Smite <S%H5221><s%> a <S%H3887>scoffer<s%>, and the <S%H6612>simple<s%> will learn <S%H6191>prudence<s%>; And <S%H3198>reprove<s%> one that hath <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and he will <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.

He that <S%H7703>doeth<s%> violence to his <S%H1>father<s%>, and chaseth <S%H1272>away<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>, Is a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causeth <S%H954>shame<s%> and bringeth <S%H2659>reproach<s%>.
Cease <S%H2308><s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> Only to <S%H7686>err<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H3887>mocketh<s%> at <S%H4941>justice<s%>; And the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>swalloweth<s%> <S%H7563>iniquity<s%>.
Judgments <S%H8201><s%> are <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3887>scoffers<s%>, And <S%H4112>stripes<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
